Hero.title: GALILÉE PEINTURE
Hero.subtitle: THE ART OF ENHANCING YOUR WALLS WITH PASSION

Intro.title: ABOUT US
Intro.subtitle: GALILÉE PEINTURE
Intro.description1: At Galilée Peinture, we don't just paint walls, we create atmospheres. With our expertise in wall and decorative painting, we transform every space into a work of art, combining technical skill and aesthetics.
Intro.description2: Whether for high-end residential projects or commercial spaces, our team of qualified painters uses top-quality materials to guarantee impeccable and durable finishes.

villa_bonapriso.title: LES COCOTIERS VILLA RENOVATION
villa_bonapriso.description: Complete transformation of interior spaces with warm and soothing tones.

residence_bastos.title: ENTRANCE HALL MURAL
residence_bastos.description: Creation of a custom artistic mural for the entrance hall of a residential complex.

jardins_kribi.title: DECORATIVE LOFT COATING
jardins_kribi.description: Application of decorative coating with polished concrete effect for an industrial loft.

immeuble_akwa.title: AKWA OFFICE BUILDING
immeuble_akwa.description: Complete painting of a modern office building with high-end finishes.

villa_odza.title: CONTEMPORARY VILLA ODZA
villa_odza.description: Wall decoration with texture effects and personalized colors for a modern villa.

residence_essos.title: LUXURY RESIDENCE ESSOS
residence_essos.description: Interior and exterior painting project for a luxury residence.

immeuble_bonanjo.title: BONANJO COMMERCIAL TOWER
immeuble_bonanjo.description: Facade restoration and interior painting of a commercial tower.

villa_biyem_assi.title: LUXURY VILLA BIYEM-ASSI
villa_biyem_assi.description: Premium finishes with eco-friendly paints and decorative coatings.

painting.title: WALL PAINTING
painting.description: Application of soft, matte shades to enhance your spaces and create a unique atmosphere. We bring out colors for the embellishment of your home.

humidity.title: HUMIDITY TREATMENT
humidity.description: Advanced waterproofing solutions to sanitize and permanently protect your walls against humidity and mold using sophisticated products.

furniture.title: FURNITURE DECORATION
furniture.description: A signature technique by Galilée Peinture to enhance wood and iron. We demonstrate that it is possible to use paint for all kinds of materials.

smoothing.title: SMOOTHING & LACQUERING
smoothing.description: Meticulous preparation and smoothing plaster for perfectly smooth and impeccable walls, revealing the full radiance and beauty of the color.

Invest.title: WHY CHOOSE US?
Invest.description: Because your walls deserve excellence. We combine traditional know-how and innovative techniques to bring your boldest projects to life. Quality, respect for deadlines and site cleanliness are our watchwords.

Footer.brand_description: Your trusted partner for all your painting and decoration work in Cameroon. Excellence at the service of your walls.

WhyUs.manifesto_text1: At Galilée Peinture, we believe that every wall is a blank canvas waiting to be revealed. Our approach is not just technical, it's artistic.
WhyUs.manifesto_text2: We collaborate with the most demanding architects and designers to bring unique visions to life. Our commitment to quality is absolute, from the choice of materials to the precision of the last brushstroke.

precision.title: PRECISION
precision.description: Maniacal attention to detail and finishes.

innovation.title: INNOVATION
innovation.description: Use of avant-garde techniques and materials.

commitment.title: COMMITMENT
commitment.description: Respect for deadlines and your space is sacred.

WhyUs.ambience_quote: "Color is the final touch that reveals the architecture."

slides.title: The Art of Perfection
slides.description: A meticulous approach for exceptional finishes.

slides.title: Timeless Spaces
slides.description: Creating atmospheres that stand the test of time with elegance.

slides.title: Materials & Textures
slides.description: Innovation at the service of your wall surfaces.
